$0.name: Step pulse time
$0.description: Time for which step pulse is active for each step command. Default value is 10 microseconds.

$1.name: Step idle delay
$1.description: Idle time between step pulses during motion. Default value is 25 milliseconds.

$2.name: Step pulse invert
$2.description: Step pulse invert logic. A value of 0 means no inversion.

$3.name: Step direction invert
$3.description: Step direction invert logic. A value of 0 means no inversion.

$4.name: Step enable invert
$4.description: Step enable invert logic. A value of 0 means no inversion.

$5.name: Limit pins invert
$5.description: Invert logic of limit switches. Default value is 0.

$6.name: Probe pin invert
$6.description: Invert logic of probe pin. Default value is 0.

$10.name: Status report options
$10.description: Defines what data to report in status updates. Default value is 19.

$11.name: Junction deviation
$11.description: The maximum allowable deviation from a perfect arc in the motion planning. Default is 0.010 mm.

$12.name: Arc tolerance
$12.description: Tolerance for arcs. The lower the value, the smoother the arc. Default is 0.002 mm.

$13.name: Report inches
$13.description: Reports motion in millimeters by default (0 = mm, 1 = inches). Default value is 0 (mm).

$20.name: Soft limits enable
$20.description: Enable soft limits to prevent movement beyond defined boundaries. Default value is 0.

$21.name: Hard limits enable
$21.description: Enable hard limits (limit switches) for stopping motion. Default value is 1.

$22.name: Homing cycle enable
$22.description: Enable homing cycle. Default value is 0 (disabled).

$23.name: Homing direction invert
$23.description: Invert homing direction. Default value is 0 (no inversion).

$24.name: Homing locate feed rate
$24.description: Feed rate during homing locate cycle. Default value is 25.000 mm/min.

$25.name: Homing search seek rate
$25.description: Feed rate during the homing search sequence. Default value is 500.000 mm/min.

$26.name: Homing switch debounce delay
$26.description: Debounce time for homing switches. Default value is 250 ms.

$27.name: Homing pull‑off distance
$27.description: Pull-off distance after homing cycle. Default value is 1.000 mm.

$100.name: X steps per mm
$100.description: Steps required for the X-axis to move 1 mm. Default value is 250 steps/mm.

$101.name: Y steps per mm
$101.description: Steps required for the Y-axis to move 1 mm. Default value is 250 steps/mm.

$102.name: Z steps per mm
$102.description: Steps required for the Z-axis to move 1 mm. Default value is 250 steps/mm.

$110.name: X max rate
$110.description: Maximum feed rate for the X-axis. Default value is 1000 mm/min.

$111.name: Y max rate
$111.description: Maximum feed rate for the Y-axis. Default value is 1000 mm/min.

$112.name: Z max rate
$112.description: Maximum feed rate for the Z-axis. Default value is 500 mm/min.

$120.name: X acceleration
$120.description: Acceleration rate for the X-axis. Default value is 30 mm/sec².

$121.name: Y acceleration
$121.description: Acceleration rate for the Y-axis. Default value is 30 mm/sec².

$122.name: Z acceleration
$122.description: Acceleration rate for the Z-axis. Default value is 30 mm/sec².

$130.name: X max travel
$130.description: Maximum allowable movement for the X-axis. Default value is 200 mm.

$131.name: Y max travel
$131.description: Maximum allowable movement for the Y-axis. Default value is 200 mm.

$132.name: Z max travel
$132.description: Maximum allowable movement for the Z-axis. Default value is 200 mm.

$30.name: Max feed rate
$30.description: Maximum feed rate for movements. Default value is 1000 mm/min.

$31.name: Min feed rate
$31.description: Minimum feed rate for movements. Default value is 0 mm/min.

$32.name: Z min travel
$32.description: Minimum travel for Z-axis. Default value is 0 mm.
